implemented: Implemented classDiagram detection in markdown extractor (src/extractors/markdown.ts:19-21)
Created comprehensive class parser (src/graph/class-parser.ts) supporting all relationship types
Implemented class diagram analyzer with layout metrics (src/analyzers/class-analyzer.ts)
Added width estimation based on horizontal class distribution (src/analyzers/class-analyzer.ts:179-190)
Added height estimation based on inheritance depth (src/analyzers/class-analyzer.ts:197-207)
Registered new rule in rule registry (src/rules/index.ts:24,39)
Added default configuration for class-diagram-width rule (src/config/defaults.ts:76-85)
Parser supports inheritance (<|--), composition (*--), aggregation (o--), association (-->), dependency (..>)
Parser extracts class members (attributes and methods)
Analyzer calculates relationship density and inheritance depth
Rule generates actionable suggestions for reducing diagram width
missing: No unit tests for class parser functionality
No unit tests for class analyzer metrics
No unit tests for class-diagram-width rule
No tests for various class diagram patterns (inheritance, composition, etc.)
No real-world class diagram examples to validate accuracy
Generic/template class syntax (List~String~) not verified or tested
Namespace/package syntax support not implemented or verified
Visibility modifiers (+public, -private, etc.) not documented or tested

missing_tests.description: No test coverage for any class diagram functionality despite spec requirement
missing_tests.location: tests/ directory - no class-parser.test.ts, class-analyzer.test.ts, or class-diagram-width.test.ts files
missing_tests.suggested_fix:
Add comprehensive test suite covering:
1. Class parser tests (tests/unit/class-parser.test.ts) - test all relationship types, member parsing, edge cases
2. Class analyzer tests (tests/unit/class-analyzer.test.ts) - test inheritance level calculation, width/height estimation
3. Class diagram width rule tests (tests/unit/class-diagram-width.test.ts) - test threshold triggering and suggestions
4. Real-world diagram validation in integration tests

missing_generic_support.description: Spec requires generic/template class support (List~String~) but parser doesn't handle tilde syntax
missing_generic_support.location: src/graph/class-parser.ts:86 - class name regex only matches \w+
missing_generic_support.suggested_fix: Update class name regex to support generic syntax: /^class\s+([\w~<>]+)\s*(\{?)/ and add tests

missing_namespace_support.description: Spec requires namespace/package syntax support but parser doesn't handle it
missing_namespace_support.suggested_fix: Add namespace block parsing: detect 'namespace Name {' blocks and track class namespaces

undocumented_visibility.description: Parser extracts visibility modifiers but doesn't document or validate them
undocumented_visibility.location: src/graph/class-parser.ts:139 - matches [+\-#~] but doesn't preserve or use them
undocumented_visibility.suggested_fix: Document visibility modifier handling and optionally include in ClassNode interface
